children.name: Coffins/Caskets
children.gpcDescription: Includes any products that may be described/observed as a container, normally made made from various types of wood or metal, and in some cases with handles or ornaments, used to hold the remains of a dead person or animal to be buried.

children.name: Urns
children.gpcDescription: Includes any products that may be described/observed as a container that is often shaped like a vase with a closed top and that is used to hold a person or animal ashes after the cremation process.

children.name: Grave Markers
children.gpcDescription: Includes any products that may be described/observed as a products or accessories that are specifically designed to be used to decorate grave to commemorate deceased person. Includes products such as crosses, memorial stones, tombstones, and gravestones.
